name: Sheepdog simulator
description:
A relaxing sheepdog simulation. The sheep are controlled by the artificial life program known as Boids. In this simulator you can observe how the AI units seek to run in packs, avoid the dog and eachother, and attempt to move in the same direction like a flock of birds (or "boids"). Press tab to see the topdown view of how the sheep run around.

Use W to move forward, A and D to turn, Spacebar to bark, and Tab to change camera views.
